title: Gilead names Andrew Dickinson CFO effective Nov. 1
text: Gilead Sciences Inc. GILD, +0.81% said Tuesday it has appointed Andrew Dickinson as chief financial officer, effective Nov. 1. Dickinson is currently executive vice president corporate development and strategy and will become a member of the senior leadership team reporting to Chief Executive Daniel O'Day. The executive joined the company in 2016 after stints at Lazard and Myogen Inc., which Gilead acquired in 20016. Shares were not yet active premarket, but have gained 3% in 2019, while the S&P 500 SPX, -0.14% has gained 18%.
